name: SpellBounders 2
description:
Dark paths develop within the mists of Diretome Keep. Wits, words and magic are your only salvation in the realm of twisted horrors and specters. Dominate your opponents with merciless intellect and uncover the mystery of the Diretome in SpellBounders 2, a dark fantasy roguelike word-game.

Coat your tiles in a corrosive poison, heal wounds, summon meteors and much more. Choose from a cast of characters and use their unique talents to defeat your opponents.


Enter the treacherous depths of Diretome Keep, a malevolent castle that morphs and twists with each play, lurking with unpredictable horrors and unforgiving trials. Face different enemies, choose different rewards, and even fight different bosses


Unleash your full potential as you climb the dark tower and acquire it's mighty artifacts. Unearth a trove of formidable relics and enigmatic trinkets in your journey and arm yourself with their power.


Engage in a battle of the minds against your friends or other players in the Arena and earn the rank of Champion! (Coming soon)


Take a well deserved break from the horrors of Diretome Keep and solve Professor Bippy’s daily puzzle. Discover new dimensions of challenge and unlock your problem-solving prowess. (Coming soon)
